Key Match Events: Shreyas Iyer is the Player of the Match
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma remarked that winning the series was a significant morale booster ahead of the World Cup
Miscellaneous Highlights: India make it nine out of nine and will now face New Zealand in the semi-final in Mumbai on Wednesday
Others: The Netherlands team do a lap of the Bengaluru stadium. Their tournament is done, but they can surely exit with their heads held high.
